#summary how to use pysage

= Introduction =

pysage can trigger or queue message to a specific object


==Advanced Usage==
{{{
# packing can be useful for sending messages across network
class MessageToPack(Message):
    properties = ['number']
    def pack_number(self, value):
        return encode(value)
    def unpack_number(self, value):
        return decode(value)

# sends a particular object a message if that object implements this message type
#            returns True: if event was consumed
#                    False: otherwise
ObjectManager.get_singleton().trigger_to_object(self, id, msg)
ObjectManager.get_singleton().queue_message_to_object(self, id, msg)

}}}
